name: 20+365 days
description:
Originally made for the#gm20 jam celebrating 20 years of game maker studio

We've all rushed to become adults but we all need to grow up some day

Sebastian is the same 

Help him literally pass the days so he can become an adult 

And maybe you can cheer him up when he reaches his goal.

p.s: the gameplay currently sucks, I'm sorry :-)
